name: BATTLE CITY 2020
description:
Any of you want to review the old memories with a tank-shooting game on handheld electronics?

The game has all 10 levels, the higher the level the harder it will be.

The tank has 5 types, the last one shoots 3 rays, swims through the water, prunes the grass, shoots laser, etc., collect lots of stars to level up.

If the game is too difficult, invite more friends to play, the game has 2 people.

Link game: https://www.gamenes.tk/Tank/
Play on desktop or mobile, run smoothly on chrome.
Player 1: [A] [W] [S] [D] [F] [G] [H]
Player 2: [Left] [Up] [Down] [Right] [1] [2] [3]

Remember to turn off Unikey when playing offline.
Whoever can clear the island must be the game boss: sweat_smile:

In addition, I also share the game code source for you who like to program, game programming using html css javascript so very easy.

If you like it, please follow the website gamenes.tk to play more interesting games.
